channel.title: Nextjs on Edd Mann
channel.description: Recent content in Nextjs on Edd Mann

item.title: Exploring NextJS 14 at Full Throttle: An F1 Picks Rebuild
item.description: I rebuilt my family’s Formula 1 prediction game using NextJS 14, embracing new features like the App Router, React Server Components, and Server Actions. Deploying to AWS Lambda with the Lambda Web Adaptor was a fun challenge that pushed me to explore serverless architecture in a modern frontend context. While the code is a bit wild, the journey taught me a ton about the evolving NextJS ecosystem and infrastructure-as-code with CDK.
